actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-421.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 252 - 158 (Record Vote No: 450).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (S. J. Res. 238) relating to the approval and implementation of the proposed agreement for nuclear cooperation between the United States and the People's Republic of China.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S.J. Res. 238 (U.S.-China nuclear cooperation).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (S. J. Res. 238) relating to the approval and implementation of the proposed agreement for nuclear cooperation between the United States and the People's Republic of China.
